name: mybrowser
description: A fully customizable web browser that really was made for you

scripts.start: npm run movesssets && concurrently "npm run build:watch" "electron ." "npm run watchassets" "npm run watchassets2"
scripts.movesssets: cpx "src/*.{html,css}" dist && cpx "src/**/*.{html,css}" dist &&  cpx "src/**/*.{js,js.map}" dist
scripts.pack:osx: electron-packager . --out=build --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=img/icons/icon.icns --app-copyright="Copyright © 2017 Myputer, Inc. All rights reserved" --build-version=0.0.6 --asar --overwrite
scripts.pack:win32: electron-packager . --out=build --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --app-version=0.0.6 --icon="img/icons/win.ico" --win32metadata.ProductName=MyBrowser --win32metadata.FileDescription="Myputer Browser" --win32metadata.CompanyName=Myputer --app-copyright="Copyright © 2017 Myputer, Inc. All rights reserved" --win32metadata.OriginalFilename="MyBrowser.exe" --build-version=0.0.6 --asar --overwrite
scripts.pack:win64: electron-packager . --out=build --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --app-version=0.0.6 --icon="img/icons/win.ico" --win32metadata.ProductName=MyBrowser --win32metadata.FileDescription="Myputer Browser" --win32metadata.CompanyName=Myputer --app-copyright="Copyright © 2017 Myputer, Inc. All rights reserved" --win32metadata.OriginalFilename="MyBrowser.exe" --build-version=0.0.6 --asar  --overwrite
scripts.build: npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win32 && npm run pack:win64

author: Myputer Inc.
